sqlMap.select: SELECT * FROM msRunSearchResult, PercolatorResult WHERE PercolatorResult.resultID = msRunSearchResult.id AND msRunSearchResult.id = #id#
SELECT resultID FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId#
SELECT resultID FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId# ORDER BY resultID LIMIT #offset#, #limit#
SELECT pres.resultID FROM msRunSearchResult AS res, PercolatorResult AS pres WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId# AND pres.resultID = res.id AND res.scanID = #scanId#
SELECT pres.resultID FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis as rsa WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id AND rsa.searchAnalysisID = #analysisId#

SELECT pres.resultID FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis as rsa WHERE pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id AND rsa.searchAnalysisID = #searchAnalyisId# ORDER BY resultID LIMIT #offset#, #limit#
SELECT count(*) FROM PercolatorResult WHERE runSearchAnalysisID=#runSearchAnalysisId#
SELECT count(*) FROM PercolatorResult AS pres, msRunSearchAnalysis AS rsa WHERE rsa.searchAnalysisID=#searchAnalysisId# AND pres.runSearchAnalysisID = rsa.id
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PercolatorResult (resultID, runSearchAnalysisID, qvalue, pep, discriminantScore, predictedRetentionTime) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?)
INSERT INTO PercolatorResult (resultID, runSearchAnalysisID, qvalue, pep, discriminantScore, predictedRetentionTime) VALUES $values$
